description: If you want to just listen to your playlist or Spotify Radio without browsing through album covers, lyrics and latest music on-line this app is fine. Also, it has 8-10 times smaller RAM usage than the original app, so ncspot is fantastic to use when you work!
summary: Relible Spotify client with very low memory footprint

description: its good, but the dev rick roll's you in the preview image
low memory usage, easily fits into a tmux layout, vim keybindings, super fast. What more could you want out of a spotify client?
spewing that Connect support can´t be implemented
Simple to use and look pretty dam cool. Would be good when playing from a playlist after you hit enter to play the playlist you could hit the right arrow key to show the individual tracks.
Very quick and uses almost nothing
Read the instructions on the keybindings and "?" to pull them up in the application! Love it as an alternative to the Electron official client

doesn't work in my jetson nano (no sound in playback). I try snap version too but it also dont work on every tutorial (include manual builds). I really appreciate if this work universal, so bored that i can't play spotify in my nvidia jetson nano (arm64)
summary: doesn't work in my jetson nano (no sound)

description: Great Spotify player

It's not able to login with facebook or with device username/password.
It keep complaining that it cannot read credentials.toml
I love the queue function. That's something I cannot do easily on the official mobile app. Would be great to be able to order the songs in the queue.
don't have to to do much to get it up and running. much more efficient than running the desktop app or opening in the browser. it does crash very occasionally for me
There is a bit of a learning curve before you really get hang of it, but after that, it works well
Threw the error "Authentication Failure 'PremiumAccountRequired' "
I cannot login via Facebook as it say that "This version no longer accepts login via Facebook" so I cannot use it anymore :(
This snap is simply unusable on Ubuntu 21.04 as there is no audio output.

i'd like to get it detected by mobile and other devices as a playback device to control its output plus i dont think the play count from here gets recorded in last.fm 
thats the only downside else its 11/10 :D
summary: best spotify client but if only..

description: Not wishing to burn RAM just to listen to music, I downloaded and tried to log in. Unfortunately, the message is "requires a Premium account" ... which (so far) I'm too cheap to get. I love the idea of a terminal player, though.
summary: Could be good but requires premium account

description: Man braucht ein Spotify Premium Konto um die App nutzen zu können. Die App funktioniert einwandfrei, über "?" kann man die Tastenkombinationen einsehen - Spotify im Terminal ist nützlich und macht Freude.

El cliente oficial me andaba mal asi que pasé a esta alternativa. La verdad que muy rápido todo y se escucha de 10/10. Debería mejorar en los atajos de teclado ya que no se pueden modificar todavía. Pero fuera de eso, perfecto.
He intentado iniciar sesion con una cuenta de Spotify y no funciona, y si pruebo iniciando sesion con una de facebook se cuelga deberian revisarlo
he intentado iniciar sesion con mi cuenta de spotify y me manda un error de que tengo una cuenta premium y no me deja iniciar sesion en facebook ni en normal
все работает хорошо
